headline: How Is FirstEnergy's Stock Performance Compared to Other Utilities Stocks?
summary: Though FirstEnergy has lagged behind its industry peers over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: What Does FirstEnergy’s Recent Stock Stability Mean for Investors in 2025?
summary: Trying to make sense of FirstEnergy’s stock? You’re not alone. Whether you’re contemplating buying in, holding tight, or lightening up your position, there’s plenty to consider, especially with the market sending mixed signals these days. Despite some recent ups and downs, FirstEnergy has shown impressive staying power. Over the last five years, its stock has climbed a solid 86%, not exactly a snoozer for long-term investors. Its year-to-date return is sitting at 7.9%, even though it dipped...
